greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Odd triangle n!. This table read by rows gives the coefficients of sum formulas of n-th Factorials (A000142). The k-th row (6>=k>=1) contains T(i,k) for i=1 to k+2, where k=[2*n+3+(-1)^n]/4 and T(i,k) satisfies n! = Sum_{i=1..k+2} T(i,k) * n^(i-1) / (2*k-2)!.
comment: Incidentally, the sum of signed coefficients for each k-th row is divisible by (2*k-2)!.
example: 11!=39916800; substituting n=11 in the formula of the k-th row we obtain k=6 and the coefficients T(i,6) are those needed for computing 11!.
results.author: _André F. Labossière_, Jan 07 2005
